Package org.softsmithy.lib.beans

Utility classes and extensions for the java.beans package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Bean
    This interface specifies common methods of a JavaBean such as support for bound properties.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeanIntrospector  
    PropertyChangeUtils
    A utility class for PropertyChangeEvents.
    ReflectivePropertyChangeListener
    A trampoline class that reflectivly calls an action method.
    XDefaultPersistenceDelegate  
    XMLEncoderX  

Package org.softsmithy.lib.beans Description

Utility classes and extensions for the java.beans package.
